pullrequest.title: Add simple example of physics plugin and loader

content.html:
I think in most cases a physics engine plugin will probably only provide a 2D simulation or a 3D simulation. So it might make sense to simplify this example by doing:

class HelloWorldPlugin : public ignition::physics::Implements3d<HellowWorldFeatureList>
{
  // ...
};

That way we don’t have to worry about implementing the plugin as a template or declaring the HellowWorldPlugin[2d|3d] classes down below. If we want to show the ability to support 2D plugins, I think I would recommend doing that as a separate example.
